-e ---

A Wanderwort for 'black' (spot):

schwarz

𓋴 𓃀 𓂧 𓈒 𓏥 swarthy سَوْدَاء sawdāʾ svartur შავი šavide שחורה \ שְׁחֹרָה sh'khorá سیاه siyâh сьӧд sʹöd scot = dark!
𓐍 𓋴 𓃀 𓂧 𓈒 𓏥||blue, blue-black (of hair)|𓐍 kar=black(𓃀𓂧) Kar-Schwarz(𓋴𓃀𓆓)
𓐍 𓋴 𓃀 𓆓 𓂂||blue, blue-black (of hair)|Kar-Schwartz

𒊹 ŠAR₂ <> schwarz

𓆓 𓂝 𓌠 𓃀 Šj.ar.ti ⋍ charred-swarthy(bileg) coal-black

𓆓 𓂝 Šj.ar ⋍ 𓐍 kara काला श्याम kala shieam = color khem PIE +++ /

שחורה \ שְׁחֹרָה sh'khorá bridges the other Wanderwort for 'black':
𓐍 🌑 kara 柴chai char-coal-color-gray > 柴chai > 色 shai3/se4/ 黑hei > 阂 he
𓎡 𓎡 𓅱 𓇰 darkness

A third root is dunkel > dun > hun > hu/un,an

black water 𓈙𓆷𓇏𓇐 swamp/shad
水shui 海hai 黑hei 河he 湖hu2 潮chao2 池chi2 洒sa3 sea,See 湿 shi1 shit schütt 尿sui1 水shui

Black=Sabbath 𓋴 𓃀 𓂧 7th color? spät 􀆴 ☀ ?

𓃩

𓇓 𓅱 𓏏 𓏮 𓁣 Seth ⇔ schwarz :

𓇋 𓀁 Oh
𓇓 𓅱 𓏏 𓏮 𓁣 Seth
𓎟 𓈖 Lord of ...
𓎡 𓎡 𓅱 𓇰 darkness
𓇋 𓀁 oh
𓇋 𓋴 𓆑 𓏏 𓏮 𓅪 𓀀 evildoer
𓅭 𓀁 𓅭 𓃀 𓀭 son of Geb

𓋴 𓂋 𓐍 𓇋 𓇋 𓀁 𓏱 | evil spirit | Schreck! Schurke 𓋴 𓂋 𓐍 𓅁 shark Gry.. 𓂓 Kar?
